title: shri raajaraajEshvari
sahitya:
shrI rAjrAjEshvari shrtajana pAlini



anupallavi



 mArAri manOllAsini marakatAngi mAtangi



muktaayi swara saahityam



kAyau nara san rUpatanu bhavara sujaya cAmarAja rAsa kala

 sukhava salisitaya hrdaya shivE lalitE shrI harikEshahitE 



caraNam



 sakala bhuvana mAtE sajjana hitE
